name: Wildlife Park 2 - Farm World
description: Build your farm of your dreams! Farm World enlarges the Wildlife Park 2 Univers with 10 animals in 7 exciting missions and 20 freeplaymaps all around the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2 GHz or compatible Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9c compatible, 64 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 3000 MB available space Additional Notes: ATTENTION: Does not work with any Wildlife Park Retail Versions

reviews.review_text: I put a bunch of chickens down and they died because I couldn't figure out how to grow crops.     6/2 would chicken again
